Key Match Events: Pakistan chased down 90 runs in 12.1 overs
Mohammed Rizwan scored an unbeaten 45 off 34 balls
Pre-Game Insights: The Rawalpindi pitch was not an easy one to handle
Black Caps captain Michael Bracewell emphasized the need to adapt quickly for the next game
Post-Match Reflections: Michael Bracewell acknowledged the team's efforts in bowling and fielding but recognized the need to improve scoring
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand was sent in to bat
Openers Tim Seifert and Tim Robinson were dismissed cheaply
